product_name: Volkl RTM 73 Skis with Bindings - Men's - 2013/2014
long_description: Friendly to new skiers thanks to easy-to-turn rockered tips, the Volkl RTM 73 skis with bindings use high-quality construction to keep up with your skills long after you've left the bunny slopes. Day one on the slopes will be easy and fun thanks to the slight rocker in the tips that makes it easy to start turning. As you venture away from the beginner area, you'll find the rockered tips also offer a stable feel in cruddy or soft snow. The composite core creates a soft, easy-to-turn flex that gives progressing skiers the confidence they need to improve their skills. Raised reinforcement channels along the top edges of the skis enhance stability and make it easier to turn once you're ready for fast runs-these skis grow with you. Soft flexing tail makes it easy to release skis out of turns and avoid oncoming obstacles, a welcome feature if you are tackling tough slopes. Integrated bindings features DIN 3 - 10 release settings, a range suited to beginning and intermediate skiers at low to medium speeds. Base or topsheet color may vary from online photo.
short_description: Friendly to new skiers thanks to easy-to-turn rockered tips, the Volkl RTM 73 skis with bindings use high-quality construction to keep up with your skills long after you've left the bunny slopes.
